About Us

Fleeting Moments

✨ Polaroids: Imperfect, yet magical ✨

🔅 NOTE • All Polaroids are printed using Fujifilm Instax Mini Link Smartphone Printer on the classic (white border) Instax mini film • Images could be sent to us via WhatsApp or Telegram (Telegram handle will be provided once order is confirmed) • Polaroids may be darker or whitewashed; the colour payoff of the polaroids may differ from the images sent in

🔅TERMS & CONDITIONS • Payment has to be in before the polaroid(s) are printed • We are not liable and will not refund for any lost mails (Registered postage is highly recommended) • Polaroids printed are not refundable

🔅 DIMENSIONS OF IMAGES • Portrait — 3:4 • Landscape — 4:3

❗️Self collection is available only for >50 pieces and above

  • Pricing
  • 1 - 20 pieces: $1.00
  • 21 - 50 pieces: $0.90
  • > 50 pieces: $0.85
  • Reprinting of polaroids: $1 each
  • Postage
  • Normal Postage: $1.50
  • Registered Postage: $4.00
